title: Roast grouse with pear tatin and kale
description: This is a very impressive seasonal game dish for an autumn dinner party, with stunning presentation.
ingredients: 3 ripe pears, peeled but left whole
6 grouse, cleaned (ask your butcher to source and clean these for you)
500g/1lb 2oz celeriac, peeled, cut into small chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
